definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: set in motion, start (cf. Ar. h.aruka move, be agitated, II. set in motion)—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[לאׁ־יַחֲרׂח רְמִיׇּה חֵידוֹ]] Pr 12:27 slackness (i.e. a slack or slothful man) doth not start its game De RVm, cf. Now (> Be Ew after Jewish trad., doth not roast, Aram. [[חֲרַח]], g.rak scorch, parch).
